title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-whiteboard
author: linonetwo
name: Whiteboard
description: Tiny little drawing app in TW, using tldraw. Providing diagram widget and whiteboard view.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tiddlywiki-whiteboard/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tiddlywiki-whiteboard/"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-whiteboard/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-whiteboard/"/></$button>

[[User Manual|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-whiteboard/]]

# Provides a whiteboard widget, use it like `<$whiteboard tiddler="tiddlerToStoreData" />`
# Tiddler with type `application/tldr` will be parsed as whiteboard, showing whiteboard in tiddler's ViewTemplate
# Provides a whiteboard view, use `ctrl+shift+L` to switch to this view, you can choose a tiddler with type `application/tldr`, and edit it in full screen.
